text: Hijam is a Meetei/Meitei (Manipuri)'s royal surname or family name of the clan Luwang which has Northeast Indian origin. People of this surname mainly live in Manipur(India), Northeast Indian states, Bangladesh, Myanmar. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Hijam * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Hijam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Hijam
